member.name: USN_TRACK_MODIFIED_RANGES
member.summary: Contains information on range tracking parameters for an update sequence number (USN) change journal using the FSCTL_USN_TRACK_MODIFIED_RANGES control code.

listheader.description: This flag is mandatory with FSCTL_USN_TRACK_MODIFIED_RANGES and is used to enable range tracking on the volume.

member.name: USN_TRACK_MODIFIED_RANGES.ChunkSize
member.summary: Chunk size for tracking ranges. A single byte modification will be reflected as the whole chunk being modified.

member.name: USN_TRACK_MODIFIED_RANGES.FileSizeThreshold
member.summary: File size threshold to start outputting record(s) for modified file, i.e. if the modified file size is less than this threshold, then no USN_RECORD_V4 record will be output.
